attrib:
+ 24 Damage
+ 80 Attack Speed
CHANCE TO CHAIN: 25%
CHAIN DAMAGE: 150
notes: Static Charge cannot trigger more than one per second.Static Charge's lightning deals 200 magical damage, the damage source and secondary targets cannot be more than 900 range away, the 3 targets hit must be in a cone with 125 starting radius, 475 distance and 300 final radius.
desc:
Active: Static Charge - Places a charged shield on a target unit
Passive: Chain Lightning - Grants a chance to release Chain Lighting on attack, dealing damage to multiple targets.

Mjollnir is a Unique Attack Modifier that stacks with other Unique Attack Modifiers, but overrides them when Chain Lightning occurs.
lore: Thor's magical hammer, made for him by the dwarves Brok and Eitri.
